title: Energy Consumption
description: Hourly and daily energy KPIs by apartment

panels.title: Apt 1 — Hourly Energy (kWh)
panels.query: SELECT hour, total_kwh FROM fact_energy_hourly WHERE apt_id = 'apt1' ORDER BY hour

panels.title: Apt 2 — Hourly Energy (kWh)
panels.query: SELECT hour, total_kwh FROM fact_energy_hourly WHERE apt_id = 'apt2' ORDER BY hour

panels.title: Daily Energy Comparison (both apartments)
panels.query: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m-%d', hour) AS date, apt_id, SUM(total_kwh) AS daily_kwh FROM fact_energy_hourly GROUP BY date, apt_id ORDER BY date
